classData.comment:
/**
 * A singleton utility class responsible for recursively building VDOM and VNode trees.
 * It can expand component references within a tree structure into their full VDOM/VNode representations,
 * supporting selective (asymmetric) tree expansion for optimized updates.
 * @class Neo.util.vdom.TreeBuilder
 * @extends Neo.core.Base
 * @singleton
 */
classData.description: A singleton utility class responsible for recursively building VDOM and VNode trees. It can expand component references within a tree structure into their full VDOM/VNode representations, supporting selective (asymmetric) tree expansion for optimized updates.
classData.name: TreeBuilder

classData.comment:
/**
     * Copies a given vdom tree and replaces child component references with the vdom of their matching components
     * @param {Object} vdom
     * @param {Number} [depth=-1]
     *     The component replacement depth.
     *     -1 will parse the full tree, 1 top level only, 2 include children, 3 include grandchildren
     * @param {Set<String>|null} [mergedChildIds=null] A set of component IDs to selectively expand.
     * @returns {Object}
     */
classData.description: Copies a given vdom tree and replaces child component references with the vdom of their matching components

params.description: The component replacement depth. -1 will parse the full tree, 1 top level only, 2 include children, 3 include grandchildren
params.name: depth

params.description: A set of component IDs to selectively expand.
params.name: mergedChildIds

classData.name: getVdomTree

classData.comment:
/**
     * Copies a given vnode tree and replaces child component references with the vnode of their matching components
     * @param {Object} vnode
     * @param {Number} [depth=-1]
     *     The component replacement depth.
     *     -1 will parse the full tree, 1 top level only, 2 include children, 3 include grandchildren
     * @param {Set<String>|null} [mergedChildIds=null] A set of component IDs to selectively expand.
     * @returns {Object}
     */
classData.description: Copies a given vnode tree and replaces child component references with the vnode of their matching components

params.description: The component replacement depth. -1 will parse the full tree, 1 top level only, 2 include children, 3 include grandchildren
params.name: depth

params.description: A set of component IDs to selectively expand.
params.name: mergedChildIds

classData.name: getVnodeTree
